original_text: Jesus took the loaves of bread and he thanked God for them. Then he broke the loaves into pieces. He passed them to all the people who were sitting there. Everyone had as much bread as they wanted to eat. Jesus did the same with the fish.
korean_text: 예수께서 떡을 가져 축사하신 후에 앉아 있는 자들에게 나눠 주시고 물고기도 그렇게 그들의 원대로 주시니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus took the loaves of bread
and he thanked God for them
Then he broke the loaves into pieces
He passed them to all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 그것들을 모든 사람에게 나누어 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Everyone had as much bread as they wanted
Jesus did the same with the fish
